snippet: Explosions and deaths shatter Boston’s celebration of unity and athleticism, but, without a doubt, the race will be back next year.
abstract: Editorial abhors explosions and deaths at Boston Marathon that shattered city's celebration of unity and athleticism but holds race will be back next year; holds no act of terrorism is strong enough to shatter a tradition that belongs to American history.
lead_paragraph: Explosions and deaths shatter Boston’s celebration of unity and athleticism, but, without a doubt, the race will be back next year.
